text: Migos ’ rapper Offset caught heat after one of his verses on the YFN Lucci track “ Boss Life ” was criticized for being homophobic. His verse “ Pinky ring crystal clear, 40k spent on a private Lear / 60k solitaire / I can not vibe with queer ” sparked a backlash among fans despite the rapper ’ s claim that he “ didn ’ t write the line about gay people. ” Offset saying he doesn ’ t vibe with queers while constantly wearing and PARADING clothes by gay designers is the REAL gag. — MNEK ( @ MNEK ) January 18, 2018 Offset responded to the controversy with a lengthy statement posted on Instagram paired with a visual of the dictionary definitions of “ queer, ” arguing that
